name: lego-telepresence
description: For this to work, we need to make some modifications to [next-ws](https://github.com/apteryxxyz/next-ws) as the canary version of NextJS (v15) is supported but blocked by ``next-ws``' support check.

scripts.custom-install: npm install --prefix custom-modules/inimi-ble && npm install --prefix custom-modules/inimi-poweredup
scripts.install: npm run custom-install && npm run car-install && npm run www-install && npm run cam-install
